We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private RateOfChangeRatio _rocr;
// In Initialize()
_rocr = ROCR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_rocr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Is Ready", _rocr.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Warm Up Period", _rocr.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Period", _rocr.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Current", _rocr.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Name", _rocr.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Samples", _rocr.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.rocr = self.ROCR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.rocr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Is Ready", self.rocr.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Warm Up Period", self.rocr.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Period", self.rocr.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Current", self.rocr.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Name", self.rocr.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROCR Samples", self.rocr.Samples);
